item.title: About
item.description: Hey, welcome to my website 👋 I’m Samuele Bella, a Computer Science student at Sapienza Università di Roma. If you’re interested in working with me, send me an email or download my resume

item.title: Skills 👨‍💻
item.description: Tools 🔧 I use on a daily basis: • I use GNU/Linux as my main OS • I use bash or zsh as my shells • vim for text editing • git for version control • Various front-end frameworks such as Hugo (The framework that I used to build this website) • LaTeX / Markdown / toml / JSON Technologies 💻 I mainly choose between Python, C or Java as my main programming languages, even though I dabbled in MIPS assembly and C++.
